## getShaderDefine() function

Acquire shader 'define' value from `defines` map.

If there is no value under \[\[key\]\] specified, function returns false, otherwise result is true or numeric value if there is a number stored.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getShaderDefine(defines: {
    [key: string]: any;
}, key: string): boolean | number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  defines | { \[key: string\]: any; } | The <code>defines</code> map. |
|  key | string | The identifier of the \_define\_. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean \| number
